DOC.brief_title: Effect Arabinoxylan Oligosaccharides Consumption Insulin Resistance Patients With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 year Regular diet ( 3 meals/day least 5 days/week ) Central obese ( defined waist circumference ≥ 94cm Europid men ≥ 80cm Europid woman , ethnicity specific value group ) Insulin resistant : HOMAIR > 1.7 fast glucose > 100mg/dL And one follow three factor : Elevated TG level : ≥ 150 mg/dL ( 1.7 mmol/L ) Decreased HDL cholesterol level : < 40 mg/dL ( 1.03 mmol/L* ) males < 50 mg/dL ( 1.29 mmol/L* ) female Elevated blood pressure ( BP ) : systolic BP ≥ 130 diastolic BP ≥ 85 mm Hg Low calorie diet special diet study last month prior study Serious chronic disease gastrointestinal tract , inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease ulcerative colitis ) , irritable bowel syndrome , chronic constipation ( le 3 bowel movement week ) , chronic frequent diarrhoea ( 3 stool day ) , clinically relevant lactose intolerance , … Use antibiotic last month start study Abdominal surgery past ( except appendectomy ) Use medication affect gastrointestinal tract last 2 week prior study include spasmolytic , antidiarrhoea medication , anticonstipation medication , and/or pre probiotic supplement ( e.g . lacteol , Enterol ) Pregnancy , pregnancy desire lactation Diabetes ( type 1 2 ) , i.e .
